description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=0/3. A selection of 3x3,4x4 and 5x5 tile sliding puzzles  starring characters from Ingeniousfun games! And, these are no ordinary tiles, they are animated! Complete the puzzles quickly enough and unlock the animations for viewing in the 2D & 3D gallery/slideshow.  (PRESS RB FROM GALLERY TO ACTIVATE SLIDESHOW (Not in Demo!) (you will need a 3d capable TV/monitor to enjoy side by side 3D)
